attributes.action: Introduce a licence to carry & use of a taser, available only to law abiding citizens in non-extremist religious groups
attributes.additional_details:
It's a fact that this country is now at war with Islamic extremists, & it will only be a matter of time before another 'Lee Rigby' murder in broad daylight occurs.

We, the good hardworking law abiding citizen, will simply not tolerate being vulnerable to such danger without any possibility of defending ourselves.

We ask the ministry of defence to introduce a system whereby citizens can apply for a license to carry & use a taser when under threat of attack. Costs to be partially funded by the tax payer & partially by citizens applying for the licence. ABSOLUTELY NO SUBSIDIES FOR ANYONE WISHING TO APPLY.  The application to involve an interview whereby the local authority can determine the eligibility of the applicant. Carrying without a licence should incur extremely harsh punishment.
